bridge.title: Transfer your assets
bridge.selectOriginAddress: Please select the address from which you will bridge the assets by connecting source chain wallet
bridge.selectDestinationAddress: Please select the address where you want to send the assets
bridge.selectSourceAsset: A source asset must be selected before continuing.
bridge.selectDestinationAsset: A destination asset must be selected before continuing.
bridge.amountZero: Amount entered is near or equal to zero.
bridge.amountGreaterThanBalance: Amount requested to bridge is greater than your account balance.
bridge.insufficientLiquidity: Insufficient liquidity to fulfill bridge request, please try again later.
bridge.amountGreaterThanBridge: Amount requested to bridge is greater than destination bridge account balance.
bridge.invalidMemo: Memo contains invalid characters. Please use alphanumerical characters only please.
bridge.lowBalanceWarning: The bridge balance has less than 10x your transfer amount and your request may potentially not be fulfilled.
bridge.selectSignMethod: Please select if you want to sign the AVM tx using the QR code or wallet connector

wallet.checkWallet: Please check your wallet to sign the transaction.
wallet.checkWalletSwitch: Please check your wallet for switch network request
wallet.checkWalletApprove: Please check your wallet to approve the spending cap and sign the transaction.
wallet.tooltipOrigin: Before proceeding, connect your wallet. Once connected, your origin account will be auto-filled.\n On AVM chains, you can initiate bridging using the QR payment option by entering your account address.
wallet.tooltipDestination: Select the address that will receive the assets on the destination blockchain.\n You don't need to own the account. On AVM chains (Algorand, Voi), the destination address must opt-in to the bridged assets. On EVM chains, the destination wallet must be connected to claim the bridged assets.

chain.tooltipOrigin: Select the origin blockchain from which you want to bridge your assets.
chain.tooltipDestination: Select the destination blockchain to which you want to bridge your assets.

asset.selectTooltip: Select the asset you want to receive on the destination blockchain.
asset.tooltipSource: Select the asset you want to bridge to the destination blockchain.

amount.tooltipBridge: Select the amount of assets you want to bridge from the origin blockchain.\n The Aramid bridge operates at nearly a 1:1 ratio, meaning you will receive the same amount on the destination blockchain after a small bridging fee (0.1%) is deducted.
amount.afterFees: Source asset amount after fees are substracted should be at least {amount}.
amount.lessThan: Source Asset amount should be less than {amount}.
amount.incompatible: Source and Destination Amount ({sourceAmount} - {feeAmount}, {destinationAmount}) are not compatible, Please re-enter the Amount.

address.invalidOrigin: Origin address is in invalid format
address.invalidDestination: Destination address is in invalid format

transaction.submitting: Your bridge transaction is being submitted to {chain}
transaction.submittingApproval: Your approval transaction is being submitted to {chain}

error.loadingBalance: Loading the balance of the {type} address, please try again later
error.loadingEscrowBalance: Loading the balance of the destination escrow address, please try again later
error.accountNotOptedIn: Account is not yet opted in to asset {assetId}

loading.bridgeConfiguration: Loading bridge configuration. Please wait a second please.

optin.title: Opt-in Required
optin.description: You need to opt-in to receive this asset
